Package org.loboevolution.events

package org.loboevolution.events
  • Interfaces
    Class
    Description
    AnimationEvent
    The AnimationEvent interface represents events providing information related to animations.
    AnimationPlaybackEvent
    The AnimationPlaybackEvent interface of the Web Animations API represents animation events.
    AudioProcessingEvent
    The Web Audio API AudioProcessingEvent represents events that occur when a ScriptProcessorNode input buffer is ready to be processed.
    BeforeUnloadEvent
    The beforeunload event is fired when the window, the document and its resources are about to be unloaded.
    BlobEvent
    The BlobEvent interface represents events associated with a Blob.
    CloseEvent
    A CloseEvent is sent to clients using WebSockets when the connection is closed.
    CompositionEvent
    The DOM CompositionEvent represents events that occur due to the user indirectly entering text.
    CustomEvent
    The CustomEvent interface represents events initialized by an application for any purpose.
    DataTransfer
    This is an interface to work with JavaScript DataTransfer and DataTransferItems
    DeviceAcceleration
     
    DeviceMotionEvent
     
    DeviceOrientationEvent
     
    DeviceRotationRate
     
    DragEvent
    A DragEvent represents a drag and drop interaction.
    ErrorEvent
     
    Event
    The Event interface represents an event which takes place in the DOM.
    EventListener<E extends Event>
    EventListener interface.
    EventTarget
    EventTarget interface.
    ExtendableEvent
    The ExtendableEvent interface extends the lifetime of the install and activate events dispatched on the global scope as part of the service worker lifecycle.
    FocusEvent
    The FocusEvent interface represents focus-related events, including focus, blur, focusin, and focusout.
    Gamepad
     
    GamepadButton
     
    GamepadEvent
     
    GlobalEventHandlers
    The interface Global event handlers.
    HashChangeEvent
     
    InputEvent
    The InputEvent interface represents an event notifying the user of editable content changes.
    KeyboardEvent
    KeyboardEvent objects describe a user interaction with the keyboard; each event describes a single interaction between the user and a key (or combination of a key with modifier keys) on the keyboard.
    MessageEvent
    The MessageEvent interface represents a message received by a target object.
    MouseEvent
    The MouseEvent interface represents events that occur due to the user interacting with a pointing device (such as a mouse).
    MutationEvent
    The MutationEvent interface provides event properties that are specific to modifications to the Document Object Model (DOM) hierarchy and nodes.
    NotificationEvent
    The parameter passed into the onnotificationclick handler, the NotificationEvent interface represents a notification click event that is dispatched on the ServiceWorkerGlobalScope of a ServiceWorker.
    PageTransitionEvent
     
    PointerEvent
    The PointerEvent interface represents the state of a DOM event produced by a pointer such as the geometry of the contact point, the device type that generated the event, the amount of pressure that was applied on the contact surface, etc.
    PopStateEvent
    PopStateEvent is an event handler for the popstate event on the window.
    ProgressEvent
    The ProgressEvent interface represents events measuring progress of an underlying process, like an HTTP request (for an XMLHttpRequest, or the loading of the underlying resource of an <img>, <audio>, <video>, <style> or <link>).
    StorageEvent
    The StorageEvent interface is implemented by the storage event, which is sent to a window when a storage area the window has access to is changed within the context of another document.
    SubmitEvent
    The SubmitEvent interface defines the object used to represent an HTML form's submit event.
    Touch
    Represents a single contact point on a touch-sensitive device
    The contact point is commonly a finger or stylus and the device may be a touchscreen or trackpad.
    TouchEvent
     
    TouchList
    Represents a list of contact points on a touch surface.
    TrackEvent
    The TrackEvent interface, which is part of the HTML DOM specification, is used for events which represent changes to a set of available tracks on an HTML media element; these events are addtrack and removetrack.
    TransitionEvent
    The TransitionEvent interface represents events providing information related to transitions.
    UIEvent
    The UIEvent interface represents simple user interface events.
    WheelEvent
    The WheelEvent interface represents events that occur due to the user moving a mouse wheel or similar input device.
